channel.title: Moments on iota's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Moments on iota's Blog

item.description: 声明：这里是iota的胡言乱语网站，所有blogs皆是一位名叫iota的意识体的胡言乱语，而与任何现存的已故的未来的人类无关。 Announcement: This is the website of iota’s abracadabra, all blogs are murmured by a spirit which is called iota, there is no linking with people who lived, living or shall live in this planet. Selfie here to prove what I said.
我们如何用科学给后代或者说后世留下一个比宗教更好（就其简洁和有用性而言）的理解世界的方法？
